input.sentences: we had a great time at work today .
we had some new musicians with us .
we had time to play in the afternoon .
we had to practice for tomorrow 's performance .
we spent a few hours practicing .
output.sentences: Todd knew he wanted to learn how to play the clarinet.
Everyone in band told him he could do it.
He got nervous when everyone and everything was watching him, so he went home.
His mom said, "You can do it Todd! Get back out there!"
Todd went out and faced his fears, and played that clarinet like he was a professional!
